Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you. This extraordinary item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and promises unparalleled performance and value. I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and capabilities, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950000. I trust this opportunity aligns well with your needs and budget. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your world. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
